name: Michael Minyard and Co., P.C. - Accountant
overview:
We are Certified Public Accountants in Phoenix offering expert Phoenix accountant services, Phoenix tax preparation services, Phoenix CPA services, and auditing, payroll, and financial consulting.

SERVICES: Audits, Reviews, and Compilation, Accounting Services, Assurance and Advisory Services, Tax Management Services, Estate and Trust Planning and Tax Preparation, Financial and Retirement Planning, Litigation Support and Forensic Accounting, IRS Representation, Bookkeeping/Write-up, Entity Selection and Restructuring, QuickBooks Accounting Help and Assistance, Computer Consulting, Payroll Services, Employee Benefits, Pension, and Profit-Sharing Plans, Cash Flow and Budgeting Analysis, Financial Projections and Forecasts, Business Valuation, Mergers, Acquisitions, and Sales, Debt and Finance Advising, International Taxation

BUSINESS HOURS Monday - Friday ; 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM
